channel.title: Davidslv
channel.description: I've been programming in Ruby commercially since 2011 and I've built awesome projects and worked in amazing teams ever since!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
I used to blog on tumblr, but definitely is not the best place to blog technical stuff.

So welcome to my new blog, I feel it’s yet another one in the middle of so many, will see what happens from now on… I hope I can give you some good insights of my experiences.

Enjoy, David Silva
